item.title: How can i
item.dc:creator: @mkdj mkdj
item.description:
@mkdj wrote:

set it so when u are teleported to your assigned clanwars team…a cape is instantly worn…ive tried to code it so the pure team (= 1 deF) and the defence team (>=2 def) pure team get zammy cloak def get sara…
so far ive got this:
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“clanwars”))
{
if (playerLevel[1] >= 2) {
teleportToX = 3356;
teleportToY = 3213;
setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,2412);
sendMessage(“you have defence…ftw!!”);

}
else if (playerLevel[1] == 1) {
teleportToX = 3334;
teleportToY = 3213;
setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,2414);
sendMessage(“you are a pure…ftw!!”);
}
but it will not make u wear zammy or sara cloack the second u tele there :S

Read full topic
